xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 20 September 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 11:47 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 12:58 <bvancea> has quit 13:10 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 13:11 <sdumitriu1> Hey ravigarg27 13:11 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 13:49 <ravigarg27> Hi sdumitriu1 13:49 <ravigarg27> sorry was out 13:49 <ravigarg27> the whole pipeline is complete 13:49 <ravigarg27> I worked on migrating to ctakes 3.1 today 13:49 <sdumitriu1> Excellent 13:50 <ravigarg27> but was actually stuck at downloading the resources 13:50 <ravigarg27> due to our university constraints 13:50 <ravigarg27> but that has been downloaded now 13:50 <ravigarg27> so will complete that either tonight or tomorrow 13:51 <ravigarg27> I just had a query to ask 13:51 <ravigarg27> when I add the terms through search box, due to non availability of category 13:51 <ravigarg27> all the terms go to Others 13:52 <ravigarg27> so how to get to know the categories 13:52 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 13:52 <sdumitriu1> But do they look good after saving? 13:53 <ravigarg27> yeah the only thing is they are listed under Others 13:54 <ravigarg27> and not under the category they may belong to 13:54 <ravigarg27> so I was thinking of indexing the category too and then retrieve it during the search 13:54 <ravigarg27> and then pass it on during the insertion 13:56 <sdumitriu1> Where are you getting the terms from? The standard HPO index stored by PhenoTips, or a different index? 13:56 <ravigarg27> no I made my own index 13:57 <ravigarg27> it only has the id and term right now 13:58 <ravigarg27> does this file FPhenotypeMapping.xml contains all the relevant categories which I can use? 13:59 <sdumitriu1> Depends, the mapping used is configurable 14:00 <sdumitriu1> If you have the ID, you can get the categories from the official ontology 14:02 <sdumitriu1> If you're using a recent build, there's $services.ontologies.resolveTerm('HP:0123456').ancestors 14:02 <ravigarg27> okay will try that 14:02 <sdumitriu1> Or from Java, @Inject @Named('hpo') OntologyService hpo 14:03 <sdumitriu1> This will give all the ancestors 14:03 <sdumitriu1> You must do an intersection with the list of active categories from the mapping file 14:04 <ravigarg27> to get the category right ,got that 14:05 <ravigarg27> will try that tomorrow 14:05 <ravigarg27> after fully switching to new ctakes 14:05 <sdumitriu1> OK 14:06 <ravigarg27> I also had a good news to share 14:06 <ravigarg27> I got internship offer from Microsoft Research :) 14:06 <sdumitriu1> Congratulations! 14:07 <ravigarg27> Thanks 14:07 <ravigarg27> wouldn't have been possible without your guidance 14:07 <ravigarg27> learnt quite new things through this project 14:07 <sdumitriu1> When will you be available for a hangout next week? 14:09 <ravigarg27> I am free actually 14:09 <ravigarg27> exams got over just now 14:09 <ravigarg27> Wednesday will be good? 14:10 <sdumitriu1> Yep 14:10 <ravigarg27> okay 14:17 <sdumitriu1> Around 10 Toronto time / 19:30 14:21 <ravigarg27> okay no problem 14:35 <ravigarg27> has quit 17:13 <Jim^> has quit 18:01 <sdumitriu1> has quit
